entry.title: Charles Oval
entry.summary:
Vendor: Apparelix
Type: Reading glasses
Price: 30.00 - 34.00 (3 variants)

How a pair of sunnies can save your sight

With the holidays in full swing, it usually means traveling on planes, trains, and automobiles to reach family and friends; or maybe you are taking a well-deserved New Year’s escape. With schedules, tickets, and other logistics to think about, it’s helpful to bring along a no-fuss wardrobe that offers the most in versatility. You want to easily get around, but you also don’t want to cringe when looking back on your vacation pics. We rounded up the best travel shoes so that you can cruise in comfort and style at the same time.

entry.title: Burroughs Eyeglasses In Marina Blue For Men
entry.summary:
Vendor: Apparelix
Type: Casual
Price: 19.00

The story behind sunglasses: Your favorite summer accessory

Sunglasses, or a form of them, have been around since the Roman Empire. It is said that Emperor Nero wore polished emerald green gemstones to watch the gladiators fight in 60 AD. Now, it's possible that he really just preferred a green tint to his fighting, but more than likely it had to do with the sun.

For a very different reason, judges in China during the 12th century were seen wearing smoke-colored quartz lenses over their eyes throughout trials. They wore these so that they wouldn't accidentally betray their thoughts with their eyes before revealing the verdict. In Europe, the first recorded (painted, that is) evidence of sunglasses came about in the 1350s in Italy, when Tommaso da Modena depicted them in a painting. About 80 years later, corrective leses were created in Italy, and it was around the 1600s that conclave lenses came to be.

Type: Eyeglasses

Eyeglasses may be ancient in their origins

But in many ways, they are more popular than ever, despite recent innovations in contact lenses and vision correction surgery.

Our mission is to change the way the world sees glasses. After all, glasses aren’t just a means to an end; they’re a part of your identity. Today, we offer the largest selection of authentic designer eyewear anywhere - over 200 brands like Ray-Ban, Prada, and Oakley.

Most brands are priced up to 30% off. Glasses store uses only the highest quality optical lenses, and the customer service team is made up of expert opticians.

At Glasses Store, our client-oriented philosophy makes your visual needs our first priority. We have created a culture of integrity and honesty, so you can shop with confidence.

So, with the great pleasure we are offering you our goods, and we are sure that only our choices of garments will suit you best. Our product is universal because it suits different customers with different demands. It will suit you best of all. And that is why we are offering you the result of great market and technological research – our magnificent product. Our employees put in great efforts to make this commodity.

Our good was made up by best experts with the help of most advanced technologies, and it gives us right to consider this product to be a premium one. Fashion has always been so temporary and uncertain. You can’t keep up with it.
